author: werken
msg: making sure the body runs at the correct point in time.

author: werken
msg: * Hacked in pertnear perfect whitespace trimming/handling.
Any tag that inherits from TagSupport somewhere along the line
- If no 'trim' is set, then simply inherit from parent tag, or
previous ancestor that has explicitly set a trim attribute.
- TagSupport has a ctor that takes a boolean 'trim' parameter
so that tags (or entire taglibs) may be marked as text-trimming
- The default response, if nothing set through ctor or trim attr
is to *not trim*, which I think retains backwards compatibility.

author: werken
msg: * Integrated a prereq attribute on <goal>, like ant's depend attr on <target>.

author: jstrachan
msg: Moved the beanshell and BSF tag libraries back into the main source tree,
until Maven can handle sub-projects more gracefully.
So now beanshell and BSF tag libraries are included in Jelly by default. We may make these libraries optional again in the future
